copy.title: FAQ features - Clickeen
copy.description: How the FAQ widget works: SEO, localization, publish flow, and AI-assisted editing.

copy.headline: How the FAQ widget works
copy.subheadline: From AI drafting to localization and SEO, these are the systems that keep answers accurate and discoverable.

copy.headline: Describe it once. AI drafts the rest.
copy.subheadline: Generate structured drafts inside the editor, then accept, edit, or reject each suggestion before publish.
copy.body: Ombra generates structured FAQ copy inside the editor. Accept, edit, override, or reject each suggestion before publish.

copy.headline: Up to 29 languages in one widget.
copy.subheadline: Serve translated answers automatically and fine-tune wording manually when brand voice or nuance matters.
copy.body: You edit one source. Clickeen serves translated answers and lets you override any line when needed.

copy.headline: Publish once. Update every page.
copy.subheadline: Edit once in one source, then publish and push the latest answers to every live embed.
copy.body: After you click Publish, every live embed loads the latest content.

copy.title: Search engines can read your answers
copy.subhead: Server-rendered answers, schema output, and deep links help search engines index and surface the right content.

items.title: Google sees every word
items.body: Server-side rendering keeps your answers indexable with near-zero layout shift.

items.title: Rich snippets
items.body: Automatic JSON-LD helps search engines surface your answers.

items.title: Deep linking
items.body: Point users to the specific answer they need with a stable URL.

copy.headline: A living knowledge base that grows with you.
copy.body: Keep answers accurate as your product, policies, and audience evolve.

copy.title: Reliable by design
copy.subhead: Versioned publishing and explicit live boundaries keep frequent updates controlled for teams.

items.title: Versioned changes
items.body: Every publish is versioned, so teams can iterate with control.

items.title: Publish boundary
items.body: Live content changes only after explicit publish.

items.title: Edge-Cached
items.body: Milliseconds matter. We deliver answers from the location nearest your user.

copy.title: Total design control
copy.subhead: Control radius, shadows, borders, spacing, and typography in a visual editor built for brand consistency.

items.title: Layouts
items.body: Accordion, list, and card structures with responsive spacing controls.

items.title: Typography
items.body: Role-based typography for titles, questions, answers, and CTAs.

items.title: Themes
items.body: Light and dark mode support with brand color control.

copy.title: Global delivery by default
copy.subhead: Combine localization, SEO, and edge delivery in one system so global pages stay fast and clear.

items.title: Localization
items.body: Up to 29 languages with override support.

copy.title: Made for production sites
copy.subhead: Use standard or scriptless embeds and keep live updates predictable with explicit publish control.

items.title: Embed modes
items.body: Standard script embed and scriptless iframe options.

items.title: Publish control
items.body: Explicit publish flow for live updates.

items.title: Composability
items.body: Styles, content, and languages combine without forks.

copy.headline: Build a better FAQ experience
copy.subheadline: Start free, publish fast, and keep your FAQ current across every page and language.
